name: Water Race 3D
description:
HIGHLIGHT
Numerous popular songs to choose and play from Water Race. Frequently updated new content and challenges. Easy to play with a simple controller to enjoy spectacular music game experiences.

HOW TO PLAY:
- Drag your finger to move
- Feel the music beats to prepare for a jump
- Try not to fall from the water slider
- Collect gems and keys to unlock new content along the way.

MAIN FEATURES:
- Lively 3D design and environment
- Simple gameplay to relax and 1-hand control
- Popular music songs gameplay with a relaxation experience
